| History                 = The Desert Sea Clan was one of the many nomadic clans of [[Sakaar]]. When the barbaric [[Warlord (Sakaar) (Earth-616)|Warlord]] forced them into a fighting trial known as the Gauntlet, the husband of the clan's leader [[Sharn (Earth-616)|Elder Sharn]] was presented as the clan's champion. He died in battle, and as a consequence, the Desert Sea Clan was absorbed into the Warlord's army.{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 1 710}}
